name: ArcadeMash
description:
"You're a hunter lost on an island
and the night is falling.
You are not alone in the night, however
and you can already hear the creepy crawlies closing in..."

Mayhem Shooter with RPG elements. A Role-Playing Shooter (RPS) is a game that rolls both Shooting and Role-Playing elements together.

ArcadeMash is an action packed topdown rpg shooter with endless monster waves.  Play the solo in autogenerated maps. Track your achievements in Trophies.  Dont forget Shop. There is five Weapons.  Each of them can be modified in several ways by using the weapon or buing upgrade kits.

Version 1.1 published 4.3.2018
